name: Enable Patching
desc: Changes from hooking to patching. This also allows more hacks to be enabled. Only enable if necessary. [Windows Only]

name: Menu Opacity
desc: Determines how opaque the menu should be.

name: Menu Scale
desc: Decides how big the text and buttons should be. (Will require restarting the game)

name: Language
desc: Sets the language for Prism Menu!

name: Theme
desc: Select the UI theme for Prism Menu!

name: Live Theme Editing
desc: This will allow you to edit your custom theme while seeing changes on screen! (Warning: This may cause a memory leak.)

name: Show Button
desc: Shows the button to activate the menu. It's recommended to keep this enabled for Android.

name: Button Position X
desc: The X position for the button to open the menu.

name: Button Position Y
desc: The Y position for the button to open the menu.

name: Show Tooltips
desc: Whether or not tooltips should be shown when hovering over mods.

name: Restore Defaults
desc: Disables all mods and resets everything to default.

name: Credits
desc: People who have helped with the mod!
